chart_data_2_advice_2: Test All Conditions - Bull, bear, sideways.
chart_data_2_advice_5: Know Your Indicators - Understand their logic
chart_data_3_note: - Note: The app requires at least 30 days between the start date and the end date.
chart_timeframe_desc: The time each candle/bar represents (e.g., 1 min, 1 hour, 1 day).
chart_option_desc: Adds one candle at a time in backtesting for step-by-step analysis.
chart_play_desc: Automatically adds candles continuously until you stop, simulating live market flow.
chart_take_profit_desc: A preset price level where you close a trade to lock in profits.
chart_stop_loss_desc: A preset price level where you close a trade to limit losses.
top_line_breached: The top line has been breached.
price_line_reached: A breakout above the set price line has been recorded.
bottom_line_breached: The bottom line has been breached.
